mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GROUP_TB(GROUP_NAME, GROUP_DESC, GROUP_IMG) values(#{groupName}, #{groupDesc}, #{groupImg});
insert into MEMBER_GROUP_TB(MEMBER_NO, GROUP_NO, GROUP_AUTHORITY) values(#{memberNO}, (select group_no from GROUP_TB where group_name=#{groupName}), 'MASTER');
mapper.select: SELECT G.GROUP_NO, G.GROUP_NAME, G.GROUP_IMG, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER_GROUP_TB MG WHERE MG.GROUP_NO = G.GROUP_NO) AS GROUP_TOTAL_COUNT FROM GROUP_TB G, MEMBER_GROUP_TB MG WHERE MG.MEMBER_NO = #{groupNo} AND G.GROUP_NO = MG.GROUP_NO
SELECT GROUP_NO FROM MEMBER_GROUP_TB WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND NOT GROUP_NO = #{groupNo}
SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NAME FROM MEMBER_TB WHERE MEMBER_NO IN (SELECT MEMBER_NO FROM MEMBER_GROUP_TB WHERE GROUP_NO = #{groupNo} AND MEMBER_NO != #{memberNo})

SELECT GROUP_NO, GROUP_NAME, GROUP_DESC GROUP_IMG, CREATED_DATE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER_GROUP_TB MG WHERE MG.GROUP_NO = G.GROUP_NO) AS GROUP_TOTAL_COUNT FROM GROUP_TB G WHERE GROUP_NO = #{groupNo}
SELECT GROUP_NO FROM GROUP_TB WHERE GROUP_NAME = #{groupName}
mapper.delete: DELETE GBT, CLT, ST, ADT, GFT, MGT, GT FROM MEMBER_GROUP_TB AS MGT LEFT JOIN CHAT_LOG_TB AS CLT ON MGT.GROUP_NO=CLT.GROUP_NO LEFT JOIN SCHEDULE_TB AS ST ON MGT.GROUP_NO=ST.GROUP_NO LEFT JOIN AVAILABLE_DATE_TB AS ADT ON MGT.GROUP_NO=ADT.GROUP_NO LEFT JOIN GROUP_FILE_TB AS GFT ON MGT.GROUP_NO=GFT.GROUP_NO LEFT JOIN GROUP_BOARD_TB AS GBT ON GBT.GROUP_NO=MGT.GROUP_NO LEFT JOIN GROUP_TB AS GT ON MGT.GROUP_NO=GT.GROUP_NO WHERE MGT.GROUP_NO = #{groupNo}
